name: Rooster Rampage
description:
Rooster Rampage

Rooster Rampage is a chicken based zombie shooter about an all-out war to save human-kind!!!
Engage your inner chicken in the single player campaign to fend off hordes of zombies across amazing chicken inspired worlds, or locate a nearby Rampage in action!!

The Zombies Hordes appear

Experience the ultimate combination of chicken and physics in Rooster Rampage the next leap in chicken based combat.

Armed to the Beak

Armed with chicken based firepower and the grit to erase all zombies

Destructive Environments

Terrain, and building destruction are available to all chickens who rampage within.

CO-OP Rooster Rampages

Experience chicken infused co-op adventures that will transcend your previous chicken based co-op experiences.
